items.content_html: 🚀 TicTask – A lightweight, open-source Pomodoro Timer & To-Do List Chrome extension with GitHub-style productivity analytics. Stay focused, track your progress, and share your streaks. Contribute & make productivity open for everyone!

items.content_html: **AI Agent UI** is a lightweight platform for configuring AI agents. It supports diverse roles, integrates open-source models, and allows adding tools like weather fetching. With flexible workflows and real-time responses, it enables users to easily create, test, and manage personalized AI agents.
items.title: sadaigm/ai-as-agent: **AI Agent UI** is a lightweight platform for configuring AI agents. It supports diverse roles, integrates open-source models, and allows adding tools like weather fetching. With flexible workflows and real-time responses, it enables users to easily create, test, and manage personalized AI agents.

items.content_html: a lightweight yet faster osm (either in xml or in json formats) to geojson convertor - 4x faster than xmldom + osmtogeojson in most situations - implemented in pure JavaScript without any 3rd party dependency
items.title: tibetty/osm2geojson-lite: a lightweight yet faster osm (either in xml or in json formats) to geojson convertor - 4x faster than xmldom + osmtogeojson in most situations - implemented in pure JavaScript without any 3rd party dependency

items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

items.content_html: wysimark ( https://github.com/portive/wysimark ) is a modern and clean rich text editor for React, supporting CommonMark and GFM Markdown spec. It is a fork of wysimark with some modifications to make it more lightweight and easier to use.
